result.description:
Evaluate this provider when the notification is triggered.  By default a notification firing causes an event that will be processed later.  This property indicates that this provider would like to be evaluated immediately.  The provider logic will run before an insert or update completes.  This property may only be applied to providers supplied with the base system.
By setting the evaluation to synchronous the number of recipients that a notification can be sent to is 30. This limit is configurable via "glide.notification.sync.provider.max_delivery_recipients" which can take a maximum value of 50.
result.name: Synchronous
